secretItems.name: Nano-Black Sludge
secretItems.description: A dense wet black paste that moves by itself and quickly enters the blood stream if touched.

secretItems.name: Red Market Serum
secretItems.description: A mysterious injection with highly unpredictable effects on the consumer.

secretItems.name: Burning Extract
secretItems.description: Distilled essence from the edge of a nearly collapsed dwarf star. Not for the faint of heart.

secretItems.name: Smuggler's Panacea
secretItems.description: A rare concoction said to cure any wound, for a price.

secretItems.name: Cryptic Toxin
secretItems.description: A slow-acting poison traded only in the darkest corners of the galaxy.

secretItems.name: Quantum Elixir
secretItems.description: A shimmering vial of blue material that bends probability.

secretItems.name: Contraband Medkit
secretItems.description: A banned medical kit with unregistered nanobots.

secretItems.name: Syndicate Stimulant
secretItems.description: A potent shot that can save a life or end one, depending on the dose.

secretItems.name: Reaper's Draft
secretItems.description: A vial of death, traded only by the most ruthless dealers.

secretItems.name: Shadow Infusion
secretItems.description: A forbidden treatment rumored to grant a second chance at life.
